name: Integrallis
description:
Software artisans building amazing software products since 2002. We build fast, functional, and beautiful applications.
We are experts on Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Clojure, Most things Java, Gradle,Mobile/Tablet Development, Big Data and more.
We provide limited on-site engagements to help strengthen your team from the inside. Mentoring and education while helping you build your product. Accelerated practical learning.
We also teach a small selection of technologies that we've mastered over the years. Our courses are born from experience through implementation, real products and live customers. No boring lectures, hands on and to the point.
